venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Shutter Island: I've been looking forward to this movie. It's the latest from director Martin Scorcese with Leonardo DiCaprio.

It's playing at Blackstone Valley Cinema at 3:45 PM. I originally wanted to schedule a show for 5-ish, but 5:00 is exactly in between the late-afternoon and the early-evening show. So I picked the late-afternoon show instead. I hope this doesn't inconvenience anyone who already RSVP'ed "Yes".

The movie is at 3:45. Let's meet in the theater lobby at 3:15. As usual, I will wear my Superman cap so you can recognize me. If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

We'll get out of the movie just in time for dinner. Anyone who wants to can join me for dinner at one of the many restaurants in that area.

- David

Summary, courtesy of imdb.com
When a psychotic killer (Mortimer) disappears from a mental institution on Shutter Island, a pair of U.S. Marshals (Ruffalo and DiCaprio) race against the clock in order to track her down.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group
